unnormalised: Yesterday, the city was abuzz. Diwali, slated for 12/11/2023, was just around the corner, and the preparations were in full swing. Markets, already brimming with people, saw even larger crowds descending upon them. From 10:00 AM onwards, traffic became a nightmare, with vehicles inching along at a snail's pace.
normalised: Yesterday, the city was abuzz. Diwali, slated for twelfth November two thousand and twenty three, was just around the corner, and the preparations were in full swing. Markets, already brimming with people, saw even larger crowds descending upon them. From ten A-M onwards, traffic became a nightmare, with vehicles inching along at a snail's pace.

unnormalised: The local news channels were running stories about safety precautions for the festival, particularly regarding firecrackers. The government had issued guidelines stating that crackers could only be burst between 8:00 PM and 10:00 PM, a measure intended to reduce noise pollution. Many RWA's were organizing group celebrations to keep things organized.
normalised: The local news channels were running stories about safety precautions for the festival, particularly regarding firecrackers. The government had issued guidelines stating that crackers could only be burst between eight P-M and ten P-M, a measure intended to reduce noise pollution. Many R-W-A's were organizing group celebrations to keep things organized.

unnormalised: Adding to the festive air, Eid al-Adha is also coming up on 28/06/2024. Families were discussing plans for both festivals, managing budgets, and coordinating travel arrangements. Shops were competing to offer the best discounts to lure customers.
normalised: Adding to the festive air, Eid al-Adha is also coming up on twenty eighth June two thousand and twenty four. Families were discussing plans for both festivals, managing budgets, and coordinating travel arrangements. Shops were competing to offer the best discounts to lure customers.

unnormalised: The local temple priest announced the timings for the Diwali puja, scheduled for 7:30 PM on the 12th. Many families began planning their outfits, already discussing what sarees and kurtas they would be wearing for the occasion.
normalised: The local temple priest announced the timings for the Diwali puja, scheduled for seven thirty P-M on the twelfth. Many families began planning their outfits, already discussing what sarees and kurtas they would be wearing for the occasion.

unnormalised: It truly is a time of joy, celebration, and community. Even though the traffic is insane and everything seems a bit chaotic, it is a festive season. Most schools and offices are closed until 15/11/2023. Everyone seems happy and excited.
normalised: It truly is a time of joy, celebration, and community. Even though the traffic is insane and everything seems a bit chaotic, it is a festive season. Most schools and offices are closed until fifteenth November two thousand and twenty three. Everyone seems happy and excited.
